mapper.select: SELECT mst_cd, mst_name, mst_notes, CAST(reg_date AS VARCHAR(30)) AS reg_date, CAST(upd_date AS VARCHAR(30)) AS upd_date FROM TB_mst ORDER BY mst_cd ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_mst(mst_cd, mst_name, mst_notes, reg_date, upd_date) VALUES (#{mst_cd}, #{mst_name}, #{mst_notes}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT mst_cd, mst_name, mst_notes, CAST(reg_date AS VARCHAR(30)) AS reg_date, CAST(upd_date AS VARCHAR(30)) AS upd_date FROM TB_mst WHERE mst_name LIKE '%${searchword}%'
SELECT mst_cd AS mst_cd , dtl_cd, dtl_name, dtl_notes, CAST(reg_date AS VARCHAR(30)) AS reg_date, CAST(upd_date AS VARCHAR(30)) AS upd_date FROM TB_dtl WHERE mst_cd = #{mst_cd} ORDER BY dtl_cd ASC
SELECT mst_cd, dtl_cd, dtl_name, dtl_notes, CAST(reg_date AS VARCHAR(30)) AS reg_date, CAST(upd_date AS VARCHAR(30)) AS upd_date FROM TB_dtl WHERE dtl_name LIKE '%${paramword}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_dtl(mst_cd, dtl_cd, dtl_name, dtl_notes, reg_date, upd_date) VALUES (#{mst_cd}, #{dtl_cd}, #{dtl_name}, #{dtl_notes}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT a.mst_cd AS mst_cd, a.mst_name AS mst_name, a.mst_notes AS mst_notes , a.reg_date AS mst_reg_date, a.upd_date AS mst_upd_date, b.dtl_cd AS dtl_cd, b.dtl_name AS dtl_name, b.dtl_notes AS dtl_notes, b.reg_date AS dtl_reg_date, b.upd_date AS dtl_upd_date From tb_mst a, tb_dtl b ORDER BY mst_cd ASC

SELECT a.mst_cd AS mst_cd, a.mst_name AS mst_name, a.mst_notes AS mst_notes , CAST(a.reg_date AS VARCHAR(30)) AS mst_reg_date, CAST(a.upd_date AS VARCHAR(30)) AS mst_upd_date, b.dtl_cd AS dtl_cd, b.dtl_name AS dtl_name, b.dtl_notes AS dtl_notes, CAST(b.reg_date AS VARCHAR(30)) AS dtl_reg_date, CAST(b.upd_date AS VARCHAR(30)) AS dtl_upd_date From tb_mst a, tb_dtl b Where a.mst_cd = b.mst_cd
AND a.mst_name like '%${searchword}%'
AND a.mst_notes like '%${searchword}%'
AND b.dtl_name like '%${searchword}%'
AND b.dtl_notes like '%${searchword}%'
